```{r, MS_SIMS_MULTLOCI, eval=TRUE}
mtajd <- function( texpansion0=50/(8.438/(4*.0000342)),texpansion1=55/(8.438/(4*.0000342)), rf=5, nloci=20, MDA_N=.001) {
  # theta and rho values are randomly assigned from uniform distrib.
  thetavalues <- runif(nloci,min=5.0, max=20.) 
	rhovalues <- runif(nloci,max=10.)
	paramvalues <- cbind(thetavalues,rhovalues)
	# With the following two lines, the theta and rho values are piped to mstbs 
	mscall <- paste( "| ms 100 ",nloci," -t tbs -r tbs 1000 -eN",texpansion0,MDA_N,"-eN",texpansion1,rf,"| sample_stats | cut -f 6 >tajd.out") 
	write(t(paramvalues),file=mscall)
   tajd <- scan("tajd.out", quiet=TRUE)
   mtajd <- mean(  tajd )
   mtajd
  }
mtajd()
```
